titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the amount of the loan guaranty for loans for the purchase or construction of homes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12862)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

calendar.text: Committee on Veterans. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Veterans. Reported to Senate by Senator Rockefeller without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 261.

bill.summary: 9/30/1993--Introduced. Increases from $46,000 to $50,750 the amount of the loan guaranty by the Department of Veterans Affairs for loans to qualifying veterans for the purchase or construction of homes.
